name.full: Terprint AI - Cannabis Intelligence for Florida MMJ Patients

description.short: Florida cannabis strain intelligence - strains, deals & recommendations.
description.full:
Terprint AI brings comprehensive cannabis intelligence directly into Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.

 **Strain Database**
Search 5,000+ cannabis strains with lab-verified terpene and cannabinoid profiles.

 **Personalized Recommendations**
Receive AI-powered strain suggestions based on your desired effects.

 **Real-Time Deal Finder**
Compare prices across all Florida dispensaries in real-time.

 **Dispensary Locator**
Find nearby Medical Marijuana Treatment Centers (MMTCs).
